verses.name: Romans 16:12
verses.text: Salute Tryphena and Tryphosa, who labour in the Lord. Salute the beloved Persis, which laboured much in the Lord.

verses.name: Romans 16:13
verses.text: Salute Rufus chosen in the Lord, and his mother and mine.

verses.name: Romans 16:14
verses.text: Salute Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermas, Patrobas, Hermes, and the brethren which are with them.

verses.name: Romans 16:15
verses.text: Salute Philologus, and Julia, Nereus, and his sister, and Olympas, and all the saints which are with them.

verses.name: Romans 16:16
verses.text: Salute one another with an holy kiss. The churches of Christ salute you.

verses.name: Romans 16:17
verses.text: Now I beseech you, brethren, mark them which cause divisions and offences contrary to the doctrine which ye have learned; and avoid them.
